description: System-generated unique identifier for the equipment type record; used as the primary key and for joins to related tables.
Date-time the record was created or last updated in the source; stored as a compact yyyymmddhhmmssSSS string; confirm exact semantics with SME.
Human-readable description of the equipment category used for fleet assets.
Short standardized code representing the equipment category for concise display, filtering, and integrations.
Identifier from a legacy system for this equipment category, used for cross-referencing and migration; may be null if not applicable.
Name of the legacy source table associated with the legacy identifier, aiding lineage and data migration; may be null.
Numeric classification indicating the broader asset class group this equipment category belongs to; values map to a reference list; confirm mapping with SME.
Configuration field indicating the attribute used to determine the asset class for this record; likely for metadata-driven logic; confirm with SME.
